alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 1:09PM MDT until March 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with around 6 inches in the southern parts of the Bighorn Mountains. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains Southeast, Northeast Johnson County, and Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected from about 3 PM Wednesday afternoon into Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
